fantasy.name: The Name of the Wind
fantasy.description: The first book in Patrick Rothfuss's 'Kingkiller Chronicle' series, following the legendary tale of Kvothe, a gifted young man who becomes a powerful and notorious figure.

fantasy.name: Mistborn: The Final Empire
fantasy.description: In a world where ash falls from the sky and mist dominates the night, Vin, an orphan with hidden powers, becomes a part of a rebellion to overthrow an immortal tyrant.

fantasy.name: A Game of Thrones
fantasy.description: The first book in George R. R. Martin's epic 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, where political intrigue and deadly battles unfold in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

fantasy.name: The Hobbit
fantasy.description: J.R.R. Tolkien's classic tale of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who embarks on a dangerous adventure with a group of dwarves to reclaim their treasure from the dragon Smaug.

fantasy.name: The Way of Kings
fantasy.description: The first novel in Brandon Sanderson's 'Stormlight Archive' series, set in a world plagued by storms and war, featuring multiple characters and complex plotlines.

fantasy.name: The Lies of Locke Lamora
fantasy.description: In a city ruled by criminals, Locke Lamora is a master thief who leads a band of con artists, but when he crosses the wrong people, things take a dangerous turn.

fantasy.name: The Priory of the Orange Tree
fantasy.description: A sprawling epic set in a world of dragons, magic, and powerful women who fight against a growing evil threatening the world.

fantasy.name: The Shadow of the Wind
fantasy.description: A young boy named Daniel uncovers a dark mystery surrounding an obscure novel and its enigmatic author in post-World War II Barcelona.

fantasy.name: City of Stairs
fantasy.description: In a world where gods were once real but are now dead, a detective investigates a murder that seems to have divine implications.

fantasy.name: The Lightning Thief
fantasy.description: Percy Jackson discovers that he is a demigod and embarks on a dangerous journey to prevent a war between the gods of Mount Olympus.

fantasy.name: The Black Prism
fantasy.description: In a world where magic comes from color, Gavin Guile, the world's most powerful person, must defend his kingdom while grappling with personal and moral challenges.

fantasy.name: The Bone Shard Daughter
fantasy.description: In a world ruled by a corrupt emperor, Lin, a young woman seeking to unlock her magic, must fight to reclaim her birthright.

fantasy.name: The Night Circus
fantasy.description: Two young illusionists engage in a magical duel, set within a mysterious circus that only opens at night, in Erin Morgenstern's enchanting fantasy novel.

fantasy.name: The Inheritance Trilogy
fantasy.description: In a world of gods, mortals, and magic, the story follows the struggle for power as a young woman seeks revenge for her family's murder.

fantasy.name: The Song of Achilles
fantasy.description: A modern retelling of the Iliad, focusing on the relationship between Achilles and Patroclus during the Trojan War.

fantasy.name: The Paper Palace
fantasy.description: A complex tale of love, betrayal, and secrets set on Cape Cod, as a woman reflects on the choices she's made over the course of her life.

fantasy.name: The Name of the Wind
fantasy.description: The first book in 'The Kingkiller Chronicle,' following Kvothe, a gifted boy who grows into a legendary figure and learns powerful magic.

fantasy.name: The Bone Season
fantasy.description: In a future dystopian world where clairvoyants are hunted, Paige Mahoney navigates a dangerous underworld and uncovers deadly secrets.

fantasy.name: The Wicked King
fantasy.description: The second book in Holly Black's 'The Folk of the Air' series, a dark fantasy following Jude as she navigates the treacherous world of Faerie.
